1370: Geldmaro was born in Waale straet in 1370.
Got married to Ghoudekinen at age 18 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Ghoudekinen, Brundonis, at age 18.
1374: Had a daughter with Ghoudekinen, Menoldis, at age 22.
1375: Had a daughter with Ghoudekinen, Badeloghen, at age 23.
1376: Had a son with Ghoudekinen, Stoethoute, at age 24.
1380: Had a daughter with Ghoudekinen, Liedelde, at age 28.
1382: Lost son Folpertus when Folpertus was 0 years old.
Ghoudekinen gave birth to their stillborn son Folpertus in 1382.
1385: Had a daughter with Ghoudekinen, Diewiven, at age 33.
